title:
Dunkl-Schr\"odinger equation with time-dependent harmonic oscillator
  potential
authors: A. Benchikha, B.Khantoul, B. Hamil, B. C. L\"utf\"uo\u{g}lu
abstract:
In this paper, using the Lewis-Riesenfeld method, we determine the explicit
form of the wavefunctions of one- and three-dimensional harmonic oscillators
with time-dependent mass and frequency within the framework of the Dunkl
derivative, which leads to the derivation of a parity-dependent of the
invariant and auxiliary equation.
